# Introduction to BiocOpenCRAVAT

```{r setup}
ii = installed.packages()
avail = rownames(ii)
if (!("oc2bioc" %in% avail)) BiocManager::install("vjcitn/oc2bioc")
library(oc2bioc)
modset = populate_module_set()
moddf = as.data.frame(modset)
library(DT)
datatable(moddf)
```
